episodes.title: They Made A Cult So They Can Marry Each Others Daughters
episodes.description:
John Coltharp and Samuel Shaffer's fledgling religion called "Knights of the Crystal Blade'' gained nationwide recognition when Coltharp's ex-wife, Micha, went to the police for help. What started out as a seemingly normal custody dispute led authorities to discover the dark side of this startup cult and a race against time to save Micha’s children.
